title: Update a data policy
description: Updates an existing data policy in the BigQuery Data Policy API. A field mask specifies which fields of the data policy to update. This example updates the `data_policy_id`.

objective.narrative: Developers need to update data policies to adapt to changing data governance requirements, such as altering a data masking rule or renaming the policy for better organization.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_update
regionTags.title: Update a data policy
regionTags.description: Updates an existing data policy in the BigQuery Data Policy API. A field mask specifies which fields of the data policy to update. This example updates the `data_policy_id`.
